label: WiDom Universal Relay Switch
info_overview: WiDOM Universal Relay Switch is an ON\\OFF device based on latching relay and can be used as both a local and remote switch.
info_inclusion:
By default, if the device is not included in any network, as soon as it is powered the Network Wide Inclusion procedure starts and lasts for about 1 minute. The procedure can be reactivated at the next device restart or by pressing the (R) button.

The device may be included in the network through Normal Inclusion by pressing the (B) button once or three times or alternatively by pressing the external switch once.

INFO:

During the inclusion procedure activated by a single click on the external switch, the system also automatically determines the switch type (See parameter No. 62)
info_exclusion:
After the exclusion function has been activated from the controller, the device can be removed, putting it in Learning Mode by

pressing the (B) button once or three times

or more conveniently by

using the external switch after having enabled the learning mode activation from external switch (see parameter N°65).
info_wakeup: If there is a SUC (Static Update Controller) or SIS (SUC ID Server) in the network, a network update can be requested by pressing the external switch four times.
info_usage: With WiDom devices, the normal switches/buttons found in a traditional electrical system can become intelligent control systems. WiDom Framework recognises the number of clicks or hold event on the external switch and can be configured to perform different actions based on the identified event.
category_description: Any device attached to the wall that controls a binary status of something, for ex. a light switch

parameters.label: Device status 1 click
parameters.description: Device status when the external switch receives 1 click

associations.overview: Devices that will be controlled by hold on the external switch

commandclass.name: NO_OPERATION
commandclass.label: No Operation - used for PINGing a device.

		<Value type="list" genre="config" index="65" label="Learn Mode" size="1" min="0" max="3" value="0">
			<Help>Learn Mode</Help>
			<Item label="Ignore" value="0" />
			<Item label="1 Click" value="1" />
			<Item label="2 Clicks" value="2" />
			<Item label="3 Clicks" value="3" />
		</Value>
	</CommandClass>

	<!-- Association Groups -->
	<CommandClass id="133">
		<Associations num_groups="3">
			<Group index="1" max_associations="16" label="devices that will be notified of changes in its status" />
			<Group index="2" max_associations="16" label="devices that will be controlled by a single click on the external switch"  />
			<Group index="3" max_associations="16" label="devices that will be controlled by a double click on the external switch" />
			<Group index="4" max_associations="16" label="devices that will be controlled by a triple click on the external switch" />
			<Group index="5" max_associations="16" label="devices that will be controlled by hold on the external switch" />
		</Associations>
	</CommandClass>

</Product>
